scenario.init: Measuring probe axis (MPA) is at working position (WP = true, m2WP = true, IP = false, m2IP = false)
scenario.action: The control system commands a move to the initial position (m2IP = true -> m2WP = false)
scenario.expected_result: WP switches to false as the MPA leaves working position, and IP switches to true within a few seconds (MPA reaches and is recognized at initial position)
scenario.instead_failure: WP incorrectly remains true even after movement, while IP becomes true - the system can no longer determine the actual position of the MPA
